scripts.package:build: npx tsc --project tsconfig.json && (cd ./migrations && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts)
scripts.package:unbuild: rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts && (cd ./migrations && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts) && (cd ./imports && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts)
scripts.package:publish: npm run package:build; npm publish --access public; npm run package:unbuild
scripts.gitpod-migrate: export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); yes | DEBUG='deepcase:*' npx migrate up --compiler='ts:@deepcase/hasura/compiler/index.js'
scripts.gitpod-unmigrate: export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); yes | DEBUG='deepcase:*' npx migrate down --compiler='ts:@deepcase/hasura/compiler/index.js'
scripts.local-migrate: export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); yes | DEBUG='deepcase:*' npx migrate up --compiler='ts:@deepcase/hasura/compiler/index.js'
scripts.local-unmigrate: export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); yes | DEBUG='deepcase:*' npx migrate down --compiler='ts:@deepcase/hasura/compiler/index.js'
scripts.gitpod: export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export MIGRATIONS_EXAMPLE_URL=$(gp url 3001); export HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export HASURA_SSL=1; export PORT=3001; export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); npx next dev -p $PORT
scripts.local: export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export MIGRATIONS_EXAMPLE_URL=http://localhost:3001; export HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export HASURA_SSL=0; export PORT=3001; export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); npx next dev -p $PORT
